name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Cloud Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Highly skilled in **GCP**, **Terraform**, **Python**, and **Go**, with extensive knowledge of cloud-native systems, specifically on **GKE** and using **Cloud Armor** to enhance security measures. Experienced in implementing **VPC Service Controls**, **WAF**, and **Firewalls** to ensure compliance with **ISO 27001** and **DORA** standards.

Expert in developing and deploying applications utilizing **CI/CD** pipelines and event-driven architectures, contributing to streamlined operations and efficiency. Proven ability in building AI/ML platforms focusing on predictive analytics and real-time processing, with strong MLOps proficiency using tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Exceptional communicator with a robust background in compliance-driven development, adept at aligning technology solutions with regulatory standards.

Led the implementation of industry standards and frameworks, aligning with **DORA** metrics to improve development and operational practices, achieving a **40%** reduction in deployment times.
Monitored and maintained infrastructure health using **Falco** for runtime security and ensuring adherence to established security protocols, reducing incident response times by **35%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy machine learning models using **GCP** services for risk scoring and anomaly detection, achieving a **20%** increase in prediction accuracy by integrating MLOps best practices.
Defined and enforced testing and deployment strategies across cloud environments, utilizing CI/CD pipelines to maintain continuous integration and delivery efficiency for cloud applications.

Implemented infrastructure as code using **Terraform** for provisioning and managing cloud resources on **GCP**, ensuring compliance with **ISO 27001** standards.
Installed and configured **Cloud Armor** and **WAF** to enhance security posture, maintaining uptime and mitigating threats against applications with over **99.9%** availability.
Designed secure **VPC Service Controls** for sensitive data protection, facilitating structured access while aligning with **DORA** best practices.
Deployed Kubernetes clusters on **GKE** for scalable application hosting, optimizing resource allocation and reducing costs by around **30%**.
Developed automation workflows using **n8n** for streamlined operational processes, resulting in a **40%** reduction in manual tasks and improved efficiency.
Monitored environment using **Falco** for real-time security alerting, ensuring prompt response to anomalous behavior in cloud infrastructure.
Contributed to disaster recovery planning and implementation strategies, achieving a recovery time objective (RTO) of under **4 hours** for critical systems.

Designed and implemented cloud-based solutions on **GCP** using **Terraform** for automated infrastructure management, ensuring adherence to **ISO 27001** standards for security.
Optimized and secured backend services using **Python** and **Go**, focusing on high availability, scalability, and compliance with best practices from **DORA** while managing cloud resources effectively.
Engineered robust security measures leveraging **Cloud Armor**, **Firewalls**, and **VPC Service Controls** to protect against vulnerabilities and optimize application performance.
Managed deployments in **GKE**, utilizing best deployment strategies and monitoring using **Falco** to ensure a secure application environment in line with industry standards.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish best practices for cloud governance, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements including data protection and security protocols.
Enhanced system performance and security by automating scaling of cloud resources, leading to a **40%** reduction in operational costs while ensuring optimal resource utilization.
